articles.author: MICHELLE L. PRICE and ZEKE MILLER
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Kamala Harris and Donald Trump will meet for the first time face-to-face Tuesday night for perhaps their only debate, a high-pressure opportunity to showcase their starkly different visions for the country after a tumultuous campaign summer.
articles.title: The Harris-Trump debate becomes the 2024 election's latest landmark event

articles.author: NATALIE MELZER and JOSEF FEDERMAN
articles.description: JERUSALEM (AP) — The Israeli military on Tuesday released video footage of a Gaza tunnel where it says six hostages were recently killed by Hamas.
articles.title: Israel releases video of a Gaza tunnel where it says Hamas militants killed 6 hostages

articles.author: KEVIN FREKING
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — House Speaker Mike Johnson vowed Tuesday to press ahead with requiring proof of citizenship for voter registration as part of a bill to avoid a partial government shutdown when the new fiscal year begins Oct.
articles.title: Speaker Johnson pushes ahead on funding bill with proof of citizenship mandate despite dim prospects

articles.author: STEPHEN GROVES and ELLEN KNICKMEYER
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — House Speaker Mike Johnson on Tuesday posthumously presented Congress' highest honor — the Congressional Gold Medal — to 13 U.S. service members who were killed during the disastrous withdrawal from Afghanistan, even as the politics of a presidential election swirled around the event.
articles.title: Congress bestows its highest honor on the 13 troops killed during Afghanistan withdrawal

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.description: Over 140 Ukrainian drones targeted multiple Russian regions overnight, including Moscow and surrounding areas, killing at least one person and injuring eight, officials said Tuesday, in one of the biggest drone attacks on Russian soil in the 2 1/2-year war.
articles.title: A woman is killed near Moscow after more than 140 Ukrainian drones target Russia, officials say

articles.author: ERIC TUCKER
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — A top U.S. government codebreaker who decrypted secret Soviet communications during the Cold War concluded that Ethel Rosenberg knew about her husband's activities but “did not engage in the work herself,” according to a recently declassified memo that her sons say proves their mother was not a spy and should lead to her exoneration in the sensational 1950s atomic espionage case.
articles.title: Declassified memo from US codebreaker sheds light on Ethel Rosenberg's Cold War spy case

articles.author: SARA CLINE and JAMIE STENGLE
articles.description: BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) — Tropical Storm Francine churned in extremely warm waters in the Gulf of Mexico with increasing strength and was expected to reach hurricane status Tuesday before making landfall in Louisiana on Wednesday.
articles.title: Francine gains strength and is expected to be a hurricane when it reaches US Gulf Coast

articles.author: TOM MURPHY
articles.description: Cancer patients can ward off waves of vomiting after treatment with a relatively cheap anti-nausea pill, but some are running into coverage limits.Doctors say restrictions on the number of tablets patients receive can hurt care.
articles.title: Limits to anti-nausea pill coverage wear on cancer patients and doctors

articles.author: CHRISTOPHER RUGABER
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The inflation-adjusted median income of U.S. households rebounded last year to roughly its 2019 level, overcoming the biggest price spike in four decades to restore most Americans' purchasing power.
articles.title: Americans' inflation-adjusted incomes rebounded to pre-pandemic levels last year

articles.author: AARON MORRISON, ALANIS THAMES and TERRY TANG
articles.description: MIAMI (AP) — After his traffic stop in Miami on Sunday, Tyreek Hill talked about “the talk” — instructions passed down in Black families for generations about what to do when pulled over by police.
articles.title: Tyreek Hill's traffic stop revives discussion about the realities faced by Black drivers
